feedback: Excellent work! You've mastered this topic completely. Keep up the outstanding performance!

Good work! You're on the right track. Review the areas you missed to improve further.
Solid performance! You have a good understanding. Practice a bit more to strengthen your knowledge.
Decent effort! You're making progress. Focus on the key concepts that need more attention.

Below average. You need significant improvement. Focus on understanding the fundamentals first.

Disastrous results. You need immediate intervention. Consider professional academic support.
